String.string: Report to Fraya at Allemantheia Headquarters. [Speak with {@linkcreature:72#1103#Arshadh} to enter.]
You see graves that were rushed. This plague took away too many lives.
Go to the Quarantined Village entrance according to the operation route.
Take the side road to the left.
Go to the Quarantined Village entrance according to the operation route.
Go to the Quarantined Village entrance according to the operation route.
You seem to be almost there.
Go to the Quarantined Village entrance according to the operation route.
Speak with {@linkcreature:240#1007#Tirlotta} at the entrance to the Quarantined Village.
Better crazy than dead, my friends!
Hunt the mutated villagers to find evidence of the origin of their madness.
Deliver the skull crest to Narpa, who's undercover at the southwest gate of the Quarantined Village.
No matter how many you kill, there are always more of us.
Use the special bomb to destroy the eldritch shard at the Blighted Village and defeat the zombie miners.
Tell Grayol that you have destroyed the eldritch shard.
Climb to the top of the cliff and speak to Lashirah at the Quarantine Zone Research Center.
Defeat {@linkcreature:40#42#Legate Mureksark} deep inside the Lost Mines, and find any evidence pertaining to Thulsa.
